summary: A basic werewolf companion with the usual follower features (follow,wait,Trade).
descriptionHtml:
This mod will add a werewolf companion to the world.
Just a basic werewolf for now but I\'m planning to have a quest to obtain him soon as well as new textures and armor.

You can find him in the Bannered Mere in Whiterun.
He levels with the player so should never be too overpowered but haven\'t tested at all levels so i cant be sure.

*Known Issues*
If you dismiss this follower he won\'t initiate the follower dialog again (if anyone can tell me why i would be grateful).

Just a simple version of this mod to see if it has much interest while i work on it.
author: Xenomorph
